title: sammelprotokoll revised
body:
rework the sammelprotokoll jasper thingy for abgabe of 2nd years protocols.

* [x] ad client: hauptanliegen, symptome, 5E, syndrom
* ad treatment:
    * [x] treated meridians
    * [x] hara dyn treat
    * [x] pulse dyn treat
    * [x] tongue dyn treat
* update some other fields:
    * [x] TCM fields (incl note and general note)
* [ ] test generated report with PROD data

title: Introduce JPA
body:
makes life easier.

incremental change.

title: Remove suggest fields again
body: just makes troubles and is not of any great benefit

title: Dynamic diagnosis: face diagnosis
body: mit einem bild vom gesicht, diverse bereiche anklickbar und dropdown (so wie TCM props).

title: BUG: textareas do not autoresize anymore
body: used to work in previous version.

title: Improved Acupuncture window (groups, search)
body:
* [ ] redesign acupuncture panel (konkurrenzanalyse!)
* [ ] tree view component grouping each meridian
* [ ] main page for each meridian (general description, picture, list all flagged points/bo and yu)
* [ ] search/filter feature: e.g. checkbox for bo/yu points
* [ ] on search, highlight found term

title: Heating client
body:
## description
like in time management games: calculate a value (green to red) which indicates how urgent it is to treat a client. its a side-by-side color value for last treatment bar.

## visualization
colorize background of client cell (un/selected row)

## algorithm
* mainly how long ago last treatment
* influenced by client category
* wiped if upcoming treatment exists!

title: BUG: every client alerts about unsaved changes since gadsu 1.9.0
body:
when clicked on a client => immediately a change was detected.
saving it once solved it as workaround.

happened in gadsu version 1.9
(DB migration step 6)

title: Redesign preferences dialog
body:
* add tabs
* own tab for gmail stuff

title: Enhance meridian system
body:
KG, LG

somehow "nicely" integrate into existing meridian standard family (with common interface)

also think about other special meridians already.

title: Improved acupuncture window
body:
* tree view for points by meridian
* reorganize content
  * JList for indications
  * more colors
* images (for meridian or single point)

title: Field indicating where this client came from
body:
where did i get this client from.

* social media
* friend (whom)
* other

title: Redesign startup screen
body:
* [ ] new bg image
* [ ] display version
* [ ] optional: display status message (what are you currently doing)

title: BUG: on changes detects wrong change
body: happens only for clients from old DB version. when selecting them, they immediately are marked as saveable.

title: Send confirmation mail when importing appointment
body:
* [ ] use freemarker as template engine to store confirmation mail body and subject
* [ ] use preferences (new tab) to edit body/subject and store in DB
* [ ] implement mail send service logic (reuse, refactor)
* [x] add table column for import appointments with checkbox to send confirmation mail
* [x] checkbox only enabled if client has mail
* [ ] display/hide column depending whether gmail is configured

**Out of scope**

* Maybe also send mail when updating/deleting appointment?

title: Global statistics
body:
Open new window containing stats over all data.

E.g.:
* Treated meridians count
* Number of dyn treats (by group)
* Total count clients (inactive)
* Total treated time

Could add feature to filter the scanned result. E.g. only in 2017.

title: Improve treatment table renderer
body:
render icons next to treatment list cell in client overview (just as for appointment.note). use tooltips to provide more detailed info.

* treated meridians
* each dyn treat

title: Different highlight colors for rich texteditor
body:
* react on some shortcut to change the color of the highlighting
* also add menu bar entries (statically configured in app, not changable via prefs -yet)
* CMD+B still just highlights, but depending on set color

title: Five elements table window
body: simply add a menubar entry to show a window containing the most famous five elements table (entsprechungstabelle).

title: Assistent feature / Client statistics
body:
add a new client tab called "assistent" which provides statistics for a specific client:

* kyo/jitsu count for all meridians based on hara diagnosis
* computed values like 5E tendency and organ syndroms based on entered data
* maybe going into wrong direction, if e.g. water should be treated but only wood meridians have been treated so far

requires more TCM data. 5E. YY.

title: Detect acupunct point text like Lu1
body:
* when enter text, parse if its a accupuncture point, eg "Gb25" or meridian "Gb"
* when loading text, parse point as well
* ignore surrounding text (prefix, suffix): dot ".", comma ",", paranthesis "(" and ")", linebreak "\n"
* make it a clickable link and open accupuncture database window => depends on #12 acupuncture database

~~could use tags (as already implemented for rich text editor) to store parsed tokens~~

OUT OF SCOPE

* recognize internal abbriviations like "BL", "RL", "SP"
* hover tooltip popup with short description

title: Improve Google Calender synchronisation window
body:
* [ ] show view (table) for delete/update appointments
* [ ] improve insert table (client dropdown and other columns are ugly)
    * render full name and nickname; always display client image
    * there is a BUG when selecting from client dropdown, makes app crash => java.lang.IllegalStateException: combo.selectedItem must not be null at at.cpickl.gadsu.appointment.gcal.sync.ImportAppointmentClientEditor.getCellEditorValue(view_table.kt:96)
* maybe dont touch gcal remote title at all! it should stay as it is.

more:

* bigger window
* proper col width
* render client pic
* von-bis schoenerer text (selten ueberd nacht gehen der termin)
* recurring flag

title: Search clients in client list
body:
respekt ordering.
keep in mind selection-hik-hak model observation/changing....

title: New client fields
body:
introduce new text fields in the client master view
* hauptanliegen
* beschwerden/symptome
* 5E einschaetzung
* TCM patho syndrom (regular text field for now)

title: Pseudo rich text formatter
body:
i want to be able to highlight certain words. add CMD+B shortcut which makes it bold/changes background color (additionally CMD+I for italic).

- [x] use shortcuts to highlight text
- [x] max length enforcement (due to DB restriction), be aware that tags require more chars
- [x] ad reports: simply remove tags ~or make it work somehow~

... could have added menu entry to change bold type (different colors).

title: Misc UI improvements
body:
* [x] treatment meridian view: make it vertical and put left to "inhalt" textarea
* [x] ad appointment: close window on hit ESC key
* [x] master client cell list: sort based on displayed label (preferred name) instead of regular name
* [x] klient deaktivieren auch per rechte mausklick (nicht nur menu); ueberhaupt menubar und kontext menu irgendwie "besser" organisieren; mehr aktionen ueber menu bar: Klient / Bild Aendern, ...
* [x] das datumsfeld fuer den datepicker (zb treatment view) bissi breiter machen; der inhalt steht haarscharf an

title: TCM organ syndrome selection
Improved anamnese report
body:
bring the current, collected data up2date. got effect on free text notes as well as TCM properties. dont forget to migrate old data (dont leave invalid sql codes).

* [x] incorporate different sources to create new model
* [x] update pages sheet (anamnese and adendum sheet)
* [x] flyway migration step to update xprop keys/values
* [x] update gadsu view (the anamnese sheet should be 1:1 reflected by gadsu's input fields; keep order)

title: More visual indications for client cell
body:
## Description

show some nice, visual indication of certain values for:

* treatment count
* recent treatment
* upcoming treatment

use icons/shapes, colors, bars, ...

if there have been no treatments yet, highlight extra ordinary! as those are not yet treated clients.

## Doings

* [x] use symbols for count of treatments
* [x] recent treatment bar
* [x] upcoming treatment via adaptive text only (FTM)
* [x] feinschliff colors for recent bar (das lila nicht so darken)

## Notes

* evtl doch ABC kategorien einfuehren...
* in kombination damit waere es toll die clients sortieren zu koennen ;)
